评论详情: Would not recommend this one. Mine is falling apart at the armpit seam after only 3 months of semi-regular use
Handsome and stylish chore coat that is reasonably priced.

I have purchased jackets from Wenven before. I usually wear a medium, but I have bulked up in size little and the medium doesn't quite fit me anymore so I bought a large. Well, this is large is more like an extra large. The size chart on the description page is not accurate. I hate when clothing companies jump at least 1.5 sizes.  This jacket is also not light weight. This is jacket is thick and more like a winter jacket. I wouldn't wear this when it's freezing but it's too thick for cool fall weather. I'll be returning this.

This was exactly what I was looking for. Not very heavy - can be work like a thick shirt over T shirts as well as Polos. Also manageable over think fabric full sleeve shirts. Fits well - I usually wear XL, but got L as the L was better fit for my shoulders and sleeve length was also good.  Note; This is not a warm jacket. But I suppose you already knew that. It is a jacket which you can layer for style.
Great design that gets compliments in the office......just on the slim side for fit

First I got the medium. It was a little tight, but looked great. Thought it would loosen up after wearing. Nope. So I bought a large. Not any better. Strange thing is that the same spots, shoulders and wrists, are still tight on the large. The rest is baggy, like it was designed for someone taller and skinnier. I bought the medium because someone left a review saying they were almost exactly the same size as me (5’9”, 160), and it fit great. Idk, maybe they like tight fitting clothes. I work at a grocery store and wore it all the time. I need range of movement for my arms. I need to be able to work without thinking about my jacket all the time. It’s a nice looking one, just beware, the fit may not be for you.
Bought for my son. He needed a light , good looking jacket. Was happy it fit well and he looks very handsome in it

I love my new jacket! It fits me well and has some style to it without being too out there! The price is right and delivery was quick. And it keeps me warm when it's cold outside and inside but not overly so!

评论概述: Fits well and is good for temperatures in the spring and fall.
评论详情: Nice fabric, plenty pockets. Fits well.

Fits well, runs a bit thin if that's an issue. Side pockets and zippered inside pocket are nice and roomy. Can't say the same for the front two and open inside pockets. Open inside pocket can probably fit a really small notebook and pen. Outside pockets may be more suited to credit cards, USB cables, and wireless earbuds with charger but without outer case.  Otherwise, the jacket feels really nice. I can see wearing this in all seasons except winter, though your mileage may vary in summer based on personal resistance to heat and humidity.

Good coat very nice style. If I had any cons it would be material feels very breakable so I try and not make crazy movements with the jacket.but all in all it’s a good jacket. Also layer up when you wear it it’s not meant for cold temperatures it just goes right through you.

评论概述: Very nice jacket but medium was to tight in arms/shoulder areas
评论详情: I liked everything about this jacket except the medium fit which was a little tight ,especially under arms. If you are taller and thinner in shoulders it might work. I am about 5-9 and 172 lbs. I considered changing for large but sleeves would be too long and body too wide I would guess.
The jacket is nice and the quality is good. I am a size large. It fits a bit snug
Really good quality jacket. I expected thin, poor quality. Not at all. Highly recommend.  Heavier, fall late spring weight.  Fits a little tight in the shoulders, so be aware of sizing.

评论概述: Stylish, strong, sporty...well worth the price!
评论详情: I ordered this jacket (not knowing what quality it would be) and have not been disappointed yet. I have worn this jacket for 3 years. It is a good 3 season jacket that looks good with jeans and a t-shirt or layered with dress shirt and sweater. I get compliments on the styling almost weekly. I like the fit...not too snug, not too big. I have worked in the yard wearing it and still able to come into the office with style. It is surprisingly practical with all the little pockets and zippers. As far as the quality, I waited 3 years before doing a review so that I have a great perspective on the jacket. Nothing has been broken yet. All the stitching has held up.

评论概述: 6'4; 200lbs, long arms: XL fits well.  Little loose.  Very Happy with it.  Lightweight, Comfortable
评论详情: 6'4"; 200lbs; long arms; Sleeves fit well, body is a little big.  Love that its light weight. 2 interior pockets and it zips up, no buttons.  Very Happy!

This jacket looks exactly like it does in the pictures.  It has a nice look and weight.  I particularly like the way it tapers slightly from the shoulder to the waist.  However, it's that feature that could cause problems with sizing.  It you're skinny, it's not a problem.  But if you're carrying a little extra weight, like I am, you'll find it difficult to zip up.  Not impossible, but difficult.  Once it's zipped, it's slightly tight in the midsection, but you can wear it.  I'm planning to lose weight, so I'm keeping the size I ordered (it's basically true to size).  Just keep the weight issue in mind when ordering this sharp-looking jacket!

This was a great jacket — well-fitting, durable feel, and looked great — except for the defective zipper pull. The fifth time I wore it, I was zipping up the jacket, without any strain, and the zipper pull snapped off.  Amazon replaced it with a new jacket. The very first time I wore the new jacket, same thing happened — the zipper pull broke off, again without strain. I’d love to be able to have this jacket work, but there is some kind of design flaw in the zipper pull. Better to try another jacket.

评论概述: Not sure what body type this jacket could fit.
评论详情: I ordered a medium. The arms were super slim compared to the extra large neck opening. The chest and waist fit just right but it’s a little long. If you’re tall, have skinny arms, and a massive neck... this jacket will fit perfectly. Seems made very well, just oddly shaped with some funny/poorly translated Chinese on the tag.
Alot more light duty than I thought. Can also get very wrinkly if you don't take out of dryer right away.

评论概述: Don't drive slow in the fast lane
评论详情: Bought this for a work beater, really like it, sleeves are a little short but I never wear this style so I'm probably just not used to it. The left chest pocket button did come off but I expected to trash this thing so I wont complain. Usually wear medium but went with small so I dont get sucked into my machine at work, fits well
In 5”8 170 lbs and I ordered a med.  fits great.

Nice lightweight yet rugged jacket; very comfortable. Like the inside pockets for phone, keys, wallet. Wish the outer pockets up at the chest were a tiny bit deeper, but they're ok for small items.  Fit: I'm 5' 8" tall, 175 pounds, very wide shoulders and chest. I ordered M and L just in case; the M was just right (not constrictive) and the L was too big (returned without issue).

I am 5'8" 135lbs and purchased a size small.  This jacket looks great and fits exactly as I wanted it to. It looks good enough to get compliments on the street.  Unfortunately it's not well made. The pocket lining has holes and I've only had it 2 weeks. Some of the edges are also fraying. Fortunately I use it for work, so the wear and tear is alright. But I will not be purchasing from this seller again.
My favorite new jacket.
jacket is best when you leave it open or don't life your arms up because the jacket really doesn't let you get good arm extension. More for style than warmth, too.
Amazon is filled with way too much Alibaba Chinese junk now. This jacket appears to be a hip jacket, but length is at the waist and coffee color is lighter than shown in photo. I returned it.
Did not keep this Jacket undersized

评论概述: Great Jacket - though Size L is more Like XXL
评论详情: Love this jacket though I bought the Medium size first and it was way to  loose on me and the sleeves too long. I'm 5'10" and weigh 175lbs. I exchanged it for a Small which is more like a regular sized medium for a jacket.
Good to go! Fits good and looks good.
Love the jacket! Gets loads of compliments on it! Just a bit disappointed that zipper barely budges so I’m unable to zip it up. Other than that absolutely love it
nice jacket. about warmth level as jean jacket
Looks great
Fits perfect, amazing quality
